participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, I thrive on helping others and finding joy in learning.
participant_1.background: I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace. I am an avid fan of the Boston Celtics. I like to listen to rap music. I am in grad school. I love to bake.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and optimistic, I love exploring new ideas and sharing my thoughts with others.
participant_2.background: My stories are the most valuable things I own because they allow me to share my creativity and passion with the world. I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I take vitamin C when I have a cold. I have five different flavors of coffee in my fridge. I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Pretty good, I am getting ready to start studying for my exams.
Oh cool, what are you studying?
I am studying to be a teacher.
That is awesome, I am in grad school too.
That is great! What are you studying?
I am studying to be a doctor.
That is awesome! What kind of doctor?
I am going to be a pediatrician.
That is great! I love kids.
Me too! I have always wanted to be a doctor since I was a little kid.
That is awesome! I am sure you will be a great doctor.
Thanks! I am excited to start my career.
Me too! I am sure you will do great things.
